name: Deal Update
query:
SELECT
    name AS "Deal Name",
    opportunity_owner AS "Deal Owner",
    party_name AS "Customer",
    job_title AS "Deal Title",
    status AS "Status",
    opportunity_amount AS "Deal Amount",
    expected_closing AS "Expected Closing",
    sales_stage AS "Stage",
    probability AS "Probability",
    custom_expected_revenue__ AS "Expected Revenue",
    custom_lob__ AS "LOB",
    transaction_date AS "Deal Date",
    DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%%b') AS "Deal Month",
    CASE 
        WHEN MONTH(transaction_date) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN 'Q1'
        WHEN MONTH(transaction_date) BETWEEN 7 AND 9 THEN 'Q2'
        WHEN MONTH(transaction_date) BETWEEN 10 AND 12 THEN 'Q3'
        WHEN MONTH(transaction_date) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN 'Q4'
        ELSE 'Unknown'
    END AS "Quarter"
FROM
    `tabOpportunity`
ORDER BY
    transaction_date DESC;
